name: Backyard Drunks
description:
This game was created for another Integrated Project module, but this one is from the second year. This game is made in Unreal and is an online co-op playable with the use of Steam servers (Steamworks). I was the main developer here and needed to learn a lot about networking in games in order to make our idea come to a product.

This is the game that I am most proud of, and although the bug-fixing process was very long and hard, it ended up in a fruitful product.
